title: Car Accident Checklist (Germany)
checklist: Ensure safety; call emergency services if needed (112)
Move to a safe location and turn on hazard lights
Exchange details (name, insurer, policy number, license plate)
Take photos of vehicles, plates, scene, and road signs
Fill out the European Accident Statement (EAS)
Collect witness names and phone numbers
Report to your insurer within 7 days
Use the Minsas app to complete and send the report
